name: Fast Food Diner Story: Restaurant Chef Cooking Deluxe
name_original: Fast Food Diner Story: Restaurant Chef Cooking Deluxe
description:
Are you ready to put your kitchen and serving skills to the test? Anyone who's been a server knows how challenging the restaurant floor can be but now you can test your own skills with the this addictive cooking simulator!

You're just serving food; how hard can that be? You're about to find out! It's up to you to get the right orders to the right people. Don't be slow because nobody likes to wait in this fast-paced environment. You think you have what it takes to make everyone happy? You might want to think again!

As the levels increase, so do the challenges. Watch out for the complete chaos that can be the kitchen environment. Tap and slide to get everyone seated, serve up the dishes, and don't forget to get the orders right. Think you can stand the heat? You can also compete against your friends for added fun!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
